item.title: Automate Windows Defender Compliance with PowerShell Script
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "PowerShell" , "PowerShell Script" , "Automation" , "Compliance" , "Blue-Team" , "Windows Defender STIG Script" , "Windows Defender" , "Windows Defender Hardening" , "Windows Defender STIG" , "Defender STIG" , "Security" , "Cybersecurity" , "STIG" , "Windows Security" , "Windows Antivirus" , "Windows Scripting" , "Windows Automation" , "Windows Hardening" , "Windows Defender Automation" , "Windows Defender Compliance"
item.description: Enhance your security with the Windows Defender STIG PowerShell script, which automates compliance with the Windows Defender Antivirus V1R9 STIG guidelines.
